"シャンプラン": "The item on the list this time... is a pain in the ass: The Alters that show up during night-time."
"You know, what was it called, \"Night Shift\" or something? Where they get stronger during the night?"
"At night, it gets dark, it's cold, AND the enemies are stronger? You gotta be freakin' kidding me."
"W-Well uh... I'll... leave it to you..."
"Come on, are you really okay with this?"
